subject: Re: [junit] Re: Any plans to revamp junit?
msgSnippet: ... It s not about that, it s about who has commit access. Junit 3.8,1 was release in Sept 2002. As such it looks like a dead/abandoned project to me. No doubt
messageBody:
Paul Holser wrote:

> ah, but to make time to get such a thing going....8^) probably best
> to contribute to TestNG instead.

It's not about that, it's about who has commit access. Junit 3.8,1
was release in Sept 2002. As such it looks like a dead/abandoned
project to me. No doubt forking to get to Junit 4 has crossed some
peoples minds.

I'll have to take a look at TestNG.

cheers
Bill
